courses.name: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: An introductory course to computer programming using Python. Topics include basic programming concepts, data types, control structures, functions, and basic algorithms.

courses.name: Data Structures
courses.description: Study of fundamental data structures and their implementations. Topics include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and basic searching and sorting algorithms.

courses.name: Calculus I
courses.description: Introduction to differential and integral calculus of functions of one variable. Topics include limits, continuity, derivatives, applications of derivatives, and basic integration techniques.

courses.name: Database Systems
courses.description: Introduction to database management systems. Topics include ER modeling, relational model, SQL, database design, normalization, and transaction management.

courses.name: English I
courses.description: Basic English language course focusing on grammar, reading, and writing skills.

courses.name: English II
courses.description: Advanced English language course building on English I, focusing on academic writing and communication skills.

courses.name: University Requirement (Compulsory)
courses.description: Core university requirement course focusing on essential academic skills.

courses.name: University Requirement (Compulsory) II
courses.description: Advanced university requirement course building on UC1.

courses.name: University Requirement (Elective) I
courses.description: First elective course from university requirements.

courses.name: University Requirement (Elective) II
courses.description: Second elective course from university requirements.

courses.name: Statistics & Probability
courses.description: Introduction to statistical concepts and probability theory with applications.

courses.name: Mathematics
courses.description: Fundamental mathematical concepts and techniques required for technical studies.

courses.name: Physics
courses.description: Basic principles of physics with emphasis on mechanics and electromagnetism.

courses.name: Information Technology
courses.description: Introduction to information technology concepts and applications.

courses.name: Computer Programming
courses.description: Introduction to computer programming concepts and problem-solving techniques.

courses.name: Operating Systems
courses.description: Fundamentals of operating systems including process management, memory management, and file systems.

courses.name: Data Communication
courses.description: Fundamentals of data communications and networking concepts.

courses.name: Computer Network
courses.description: Computer network architectures, protocols, and applications.

courses.name: Internet of Things (IOT)
courses.description: Introduction to IoT concepts, architectures, and applications.

courses.name: Network Security
courses.description: Network security concepts, threats, and protection mechanisms.

courses.name: Computer Networks II
courses.description: Advanced topics in computer networks including routing, switching, and network management.

courses.name: LAN Design
courses.description: Local Area Network design principles and implementation techniques.

courses.name: Logic Design
courses.description: Digital logic design concepts including combinational and sequential circuits.

courses.name: Computer Design & Architecture
courses.description: Computer organization and architecture, including processor design, memory hierarchy, and I/O systems.

courses.name: Computer Maintenance
courses.description: Hardware and software maintenance techniques for computer systems.

courses.name: Field Training I (Summer Year I)
courses.description: First summer training experience in industry or relevant professional setting.

courses.name: Diploma IT Project
courses.description: First part of the diploma project focusing on IT solution design and implementation.

courses.name: Diploma IT Project II
courses.description: Second part of the diploma project focusing on advanced implementation and testing.

courses.name: Field Training II (Summer Year 2)
courses.description: Second summer training experience building on Field Training I.
